events.name: event.report_updated

steps.name: search_air_india_news
steps.description: Search for latest news on Air India jet crash incident

args.objective: Search for the latest news and updates on the Air India jet crash incident. Focus on new developments, investigation updates, official statements, and any breaking news related to the Air India jet crash. Prioritize credible news sources and official reports.
args.additional_context: This is a daily monitoring task to track ongoing developments in the Air India jet crash incident. Please provide comprehensive coverage of any new information.

steps.name: update_context_report
steps.description: Update or create context hub report with new findings

args.objective: Update the context hub report on the Air India jet crash incident with the latest findings. Create a comprehensive report if it doesn't exist. Include all new information, analysis, and maintain a chronological record of developments.
args.additional_context: Use the news search results to update the existing context hub report or create a new one. Ensure the report is well-structured and includes links to sources where possible.

steps.name: send_teams_notification
steps.description: Send Teams notification about new developments
